title: "Two tasks are better than one: Learning if and how much it’s raining improves deep models"
excerpt: "To measure precipitation from satellite data, researchers from the Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo, developed a deep-learning–based precipitation retrieval framework. Rather than identifying rain areas through classification and then determining the rate of rain through regression,"
